ray.math

Class Point2

  • java.lang.Object
    • ray.math.Tuple2
      • ray.math.Point2

  • public class Point2
extends Tuple2
    GENERAL CONTRACT FOR ALL MATH CLASSES. -- The destination of every method is assumed to be the object the method was called on. For example: c.add(a,b) means c = a + b. -- Whenever one operand of a binary operand is missing, it is assumed to be the object the method was called upon. For example: c.add(a) means c = c + a. Class for 2d points.
    Author:
    arbree Aug 18, 2005 Point2.java Copyright 2005 Program of Computer Graphics, Cornell University
